edu.byu.rpg.entities.base

Class DrawableEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity
      • edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.UpdatableEntity
        • edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.DrawableEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityStaging

    public abstract class DrawableEntity
extends UpdatableEntity
    This class is an extension of UpdatableEntity, So any object that implements this base class will be plugged directly into RpgGame.engine's update loop. DrawableEntity objects, in addition to being updated, will also be drawn at the end of each update loop.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity

        componentAdded, componentRemoved, flags

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawableEntity(RpgGame game)
      Automatically registers this entity with RpgGame.engine, and also adds a DrawComponent to this entity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawableEntity

        public DrawableEntity(RpgGame game)

        game - Our main game class.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(float delta,
                          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        This is the draw function for this entity. It will be called automatically on every iteration of RpgGame.engine's core update loop. Don't worry about calling SpriteBatch.begin() or SpriteBatch.end(), because those functions should both be called within ScreenBase.render(float) before and after RpgGame.engine is updated.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since last frame.
        batch - The SpriteBatch used to draw (RpgGame.batch, automatically passed to this entity by DrawSystem).
